item.title: My First Post Buddy
item.description:
Welcome to my first post on this site. I’ll use this space to share short updates, notes, and experiments related to the project.

This post was created as a starter example. Edit the file at content/posts/my-first-post/index.md to replace this text with your own content.

Tips:

  • Add images to the post by placing them in assets/img/ and referencing them in the Markdown.
  • Use categories and tags in the front matter to organize content.
  • Run hugo server -D to preview the site locally.

Happy writing!
